name: RSteiner.jpg
birth: 25 February 1861 Murakirály, Austria-Hungary, now Donji Kraljevec Croatia
main_interests: Metaphysics, Epistemology, Philosophy of science, Esotericism, Christianity, Theosophy, Freemasonry
influences: Franz Brentano, Wilhelm Dilthey, Fichte, Hegel, Goethe, Schiller
influenced: Owen Barfield, Josef Beuys, Peter Deunov, Wassily Kandinsky, Albert Schweitzer, Richard Tarnas, Ken Wilber
notable_ideas: Anthroposophy, Anthroposophical Medicine, Biodynamic Agriculture, Eurythmy, Spiritual Science, Waldorf Education
